20101202023023.000|20101202023025.000|CC1|$3.9 TRILLION IN DEFICITS OVER

20101202023039.000|20101202023042.000|CC1|DEFENSE.

20101202023044.000|20101202023047.000|CC1|WOULD BE CUT FOR UPPER INCOMES  
20101202023047.000|20101202023050.000|CC1|AND THE RETIREMENT AGE WOULD    
20101202023050.000|20101202023051.000|CC1|RISE FROM 67 TO 69 BY THE YEAR

20101202023104.000|20101202023105.000|CC1|MORE THAN $1,700 PER TAXPAYER
